mapper.select: /* getLastTagCntInfo */ select idx, tagidx, stat, regdate from items_tags_keys where idx = #{idx} order by tagidx DESC limit 1
/* getLastTagSuccessInfo */ select idx, tagidx, stat, regdate from items_tags_keys where idx = #{idx} and stat in ('S', 'Y') order by tagidx DESC limit 1
/* getSuccessTagList */ select idx, tagidx, stat, regdate from items_tags_keys where idx = #{idx} and stat = 'S' order by tagidx DESC
mapper.insert: /* insItemsTagsKeys */ insert into items_tags_keys (idx, tagidx, stat, regdate) values (#{idx}, #{tagidx}, 'Y', now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate = now(), stat = 'Y'

/* insItemsMetas */ insert into items_tags_metas (idx, tagidx, mtype, meta, regdate, regid) values (#{idx}, #{tagidx}, #{mtype}, #{meta}, now(), #{regid}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE meta = #{meta}, regid = #{regid}, regdate = now()

/* insItemsMetas */ insert into items_tags_metas_0517 (idx, tagidx, mtype, meta, regdate, regid, meta_orig) values (#{idx}, #{tagidx}, #{mtype}, #{meta}, now(), #{regid}, #{meta_orig}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE meta = #{meta}, meta_orig = #{meta_orig}, regid = #{regid}, regdate = now()
mapper.select: /* getYjTagsMetasByItemidx */ select ym.title, ym.title2, ym.yj_id, ym.mtype, ym.meta, ym.regdate from items it inner join ccube_contents cc on cc.CONTENT_ID = it.cid inner join yj_items_out2 yj on yj.yj_id = cc.kmrb_id inner join yj_tags_metas ym on ym.yj_id = yj.yj_id where it.idx = #{idx}
